description: Providing warmth from trail to bar, The Axeman defies both frigid days and fair-weather trends. From waxed canvas to wool, The Axeman has now been constructed in their most complete offering yet. Iconic details like the fireman clasps and supple sherpa lining have carved out space in every man's bag for over a decade. Now available in a beautiful and durable Waxed Ripstop from legendary Halley Stevensons established in Scotland since 1864.
name: Roark Axeman x Halley Stevensons Jacket - Mens
